synopsis.text: Mito may see it as the coolest ability, but for 15-year-old Chacha Kenomoto, her unique talent to communicate with cats is nothing short of a mixed blessing. As a typical high school freshman, Chacha yearns for a normal life, but her extraordinary gift turns her everyday school experiences into a feline frenzy. From unwanted marriage proposals by stray cats to unexpected test help from her neighborhood friends, Chacha's life is anything but ordinary. In this delightful series, follow Chacha as she navigates the world of high school while deciphering the secret lives of cats in her neighborhood. With each episode lasting only two to three minutes, you'll be treated to a charming and entertaining glimpse into the world of Chacha and her feline friends.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
